# THREAD LOG — TEMPLATE (append to /docs/tasklists/logs/THREAD-LOG_MASTER.md)

Purpose:
- This template is used to create a complete Thread Closeout Record for each implementation task.
- Copy the block below, fill it in, and append it to `/docs/tasklists/logs/THREAD-LOG_MASTER.md`.

---

## YYYY-MM-DD — Task T## — <short task title>

### Where we started
- Repo baseline (commit / zip / thread): <value>
- Site baseline (what was working / broken): <value>

### What we intended to do
- <bullet 1>
- <bullet 2>

### What actually got changed
- <bullet 1: file/path and what changed>
- <bullet 2: file/path and what changed>

### What worked
- <what is now confirmed working, with the page/route>

### What broke (and was it fixed?)
- <what broke, how it was detected, and the fix status>

### What we observed
- <key observations from live testing / logs / build>

### Verification evidence
- Cloudflare build: <pass/fail + build id if available>
- Local smoke checks: <commands run + outcome>
- Live routes checked: <list>

### Where the next thread starts
- Next task (T##): <value>
- First action to take: <value>
- Known risks / watch-outs: <value>
